articles.author: Sheena Vasani
articles.title: WhatsApp gives you up to two days to delete a message, instead of one hour - The Verge
articles.description: WhatsApp users can now delete messages within a little over two days after sending them. Previously, the company only gave users an hour to do so.
articles.content:
You no longer have just an hour
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Sent a wildly inappropriate text meant for your boo to, I dont know, your boss? Now you have some extra time to save face and… [+1215 chars]
